entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, mentioned as starting to speak but then groaning.

entities.name: gilderoy lockhart
entities.description: A wizard who is introduced as walking onto the stage and speaking to the students.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: The potions master who is accompanying Lockhart on stage and is mentioned as having some knowledge of duelling.

entities.name: professor dumbledore
entities.description: A wizard who has granted permission for the Duelling Club to start.

relationships.description: Lockhart introduces Snape as his assistant and mentions that he has agreed to help with a demonstration.
Lockhart mentions that Professor Dumbledore has granted him permission to start the Duelling Club.
